caption.p: Microstructures formed at cooling rates of ( a, e1, i, m) 0.5 °C/s, ( b, f, j, n) 1.5 °C/s, ( c, g, k, o) 15 °C/s, and ( d, h, l, p) 50 °C/s with austenitization temperatures of ( a– d) 950 °C, ( e– h) 1050 °C, ( i– l) 1150 °C, and ( m– p) 1250 °C. PF: Polygonal ferrite; AF: Acicular ferrite; GBF: Grain boundary ferrite; P: Pearlite; B: Bainite; M: Martensite.
